required_header.download_date: ClinicalTrials.gov processed this data on November 19, 2021
required_header.link_text: Link to the current ClinicalTrials.gov record.

clinical_study.brief_title: Long-term Interventional Follow-up Study of Children With Prader-Willi Syndrome Included in the OTBB3 Clinical Trial
clinical_study.official_title: Long-term Interventional Follow-up Study up to 4 Years of Age of Children With Prader-Willi Syndrome Included in the OTBB3 Clinical Trial and Comparison With an Untreated Cohort of Children With Prader-Willi Syndrome

brief_summary.textblock:
This study is a prospective, multicentre, interventional cohort study in children with PWS over 4 years (no treatment administered). The duration of the preceding OTTB3 study is 26 weeks. An untreated cohort of children with PWS will be included at an age of 2 years and followed up until an age of 4 years.
Regarding the untreated cohort, children with PWS born in France and too old to be recruited in OTBB3 trial, principally those who were born within one year before the start of OTBB3 trial, will be offered to participate in this study. Infants born later who couldn't be included in OTBB3 study will be also offered to participate.

primary_outcome.measure: Confirmation of the long term safety profile (1)
primary_outcome.description: The number of patients with adverse events (AEs)

primary_outcome.measure: Confirmation of the long term safety profile (2)
primary_outcome.description: The percentage of patients with adverse events (AEs)

primary_outcome.measure: Confirmation of the long term safety profile (3)
primary_outcome.description: Assessment in the treated cohort of the occurrence of the main comorbidities in Prader Willi Syndrome

primary_outcome.measure: Confirmation of the long term safety profile (4)
primary_outcome.description: Assessment in the treated cohort of: The occurrence of medications, surgery and rehabilitations by collecting type, age (years) at start and stop, dosing or frequency

secondary_outcome.measure: Complete the safety assessment by the description of the development of the child (1.1)
secondary_outcome.description: Assessment in the treated cohort of: weight (kilograms)

secondary_outcome.measure: Complete the safety assessment by the description of the development of the child (1.2)
secondary_outcome.description: Assessment in the treated cohort of: height (meters)

secondary_outcome.measure: Complete the safety assessment by the description of the development of the child (1.3)
secondary_outcome.description: Assessment in the treated cohort of: BMI (kg/m^2)

secondary_outcome.measure: Complete the safety assessment by the description of the development of the child (2.1)
secondary_outcome.description: Assessment in the treated cohort of Child development: age at which sitting has been reached

secondary_outcome.measure: Complete the safety assessment by the description of the development of the child (2.2)
secondary_outcome.description: Assessment in the treated cohort of Child development: age at which crawling has been reached

secondary_outcome.measure: Complete the safety assessment by the description of the development of the child (2.3)
secondary_outcome.description: Assessment in the treated cohort of Child development: age at which walking has been reached

secondary_outcome.measure: Complete the safety assessment by the description of the development of the child (2.4)
secondary_outcome.description: Assessment in the treated cohort of Child development: age at which running has been reached

secondary_outcome.measure: Complete the safety assessment by the description of the severity of the disease
secondary_outcome.description: Severity of the disease for: Eating disorders by using Hyperphagia Questionnaire for Clinical Trials (HQCT);

secondary_outcome.measure: Complete the safety assessment by the description of the severity of the disease (2)
secondary_outcome.description: Severity of the disease for: Psychiatric disorders by using the Child Behaviour Checklist (CBCL);

secondary_outcome.measure: Assessment of endocrine disorders by IGF1
secondary_outcome.description: Analysis of plasma Insulin-like growth factor 1 (IGF1, ng/mL)

secondary_outcome.measure: Assessment of endocrine disorders by TSH
secondary_outcome.description: Analysis of plasma thyroid stimulating hormone (TSH, µUI/mL)

arm_group.description: babies treated with Oxytocin during the OTBB3 study
babies not included in the OTBB3 study and therefore never treated with Oxytocin

intervention.intervention_name: Follow-up study of the treated cohort
intervention.description: follow-up study of the patients in the treated cohort: that have been included in the otbb3 study

intervention.intervention_name: Follow-up study of the untreated cohort
intervention.description: follow-up study of the patients in the untreated cohort: that have NOT been included in the otbb3 study

facility.name: Centre de réfrence Prader-Willi, Hospital of infants
